ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Thermal Cloak Recipe
ygData.msgSnippet: Just to make sure everyone knows... this message was an example of what type of quest they could implement.  This was not a real quest.
ygData.messageBody:
Just to make sure everyone knows... this message was an example of what
type of quest they could implement. This was not a real quest.

At 03:42 PM 7/24/00 -0400, you wrote:
>Man.. they should have just made it a quest item. Go up that gnome
>merchant and hail him...
>
>/say "Hail XXXXXXX" (I forget his name)
>
>Hello there! I haven't seen you around these parts have I? We don't get
>many visitors around here.. must be the goblins that scare people
>away. They aren't the greatest fellows but at least you can trade with
>them. There's this one that sells cloaks that they make.. Rather nice
>fitting on us gnomes. I would love to have one to replace this [tattered
>gnomish cloak].
>
>/say What tattered gnomish cloak?
>
>/say What cloak? This old rag hanging off my back. The goblin that sells
>them will only barter with people.. He has a liking for Ogre heads for some
>reason.. I think they like to eat them. Tell you what, you bring an Ogre's
>Head I'll give you one of us gnome's old cloak.. they're in decent shape,
>better than some old Ogre's head for sure.. sound like a deal?
>
>So you run out to OOT... whack one of them Ogres and take the head. You
>can get two heads per trip (two ogres and they heads are lore, but they are
>different heads). Much better than going in there an whacking
>clockworks. Geez. This isn't a very good quest example, but it certainly
>proves that if they spent 10 minutes they could come up with a lame quest
>like this.. what if they spent an hour? Could probably do something decent.
>
>
>At 06:49 PM 7/24/00 +0000, you wrote:
> >1 Metal Rod
> >1 Firewater
> >1 Tattered Gnomish Cloak
> >Sol A on Clockworks, Bartenders, Goblins Torturers
> >Was discovered by Gozza.
